amendment.description: To strengthen the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission's authority to review public utility mergers.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1413 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 44. Record Vote Number: 313.

Amendment SA 1413 proposed by Senator Bingaman to Amendment SA 1412. (consideration: CR S10116-10125) To strengthen the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission's authority to review public utility mergers.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1413 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 44. Record Vote Number: 313.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1413 proposed by Senator Bingaman to Amendment SA 1412.
